About Me

Hi, my name’s Brett and I’m a senior network system administrator. As well as administrating systems I also have experience making software and web apps. I have worked at a number of companies gaining teamwork and leadership skills.

I am most skilled in: AWS and Eating Pizza

Projects

Sprint

sprint.bulkmro.com

Sprint is a full-stack technology platform which is a one-stop solution for all supply chain procurement needs for BulkMRO's customers and suppliers.

Started working on this project almost from the beginning. Worked with the team to build awesome new features and applications. Mainly worked as a full-stack developer with the technologies like Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, VUE JS, Redis, Memchache Postgres etc.

Sprint Customer Portal

sprint.bulkmro.com/customers

Sprint Customer Portal is a full-stack technology platform which is a one-stop E-Commerce platform for BulkMRO's customers.

Started this project single handedly. It was my first experience to build an e-commerce platform. Collaborated with the Management and took their inputs for develop new features and modules. Mainly worked as a full-stack developer with the technologies like Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, VUE JS, Redis, Memchache Postgres etc.
